You know Alex, these forums are getting bigger and bigger, and by the end of April, it's more then likely you'll have at least 80 members.  I would think that by then you should at least think about getting a chat room.  I for one think it's a good idea if you post certain times one your website about when you'll be in the Chat Room to provide help.  Just a suggestion, mind.

Matthew G.

Posts.EditableText:
Another one of those "multiple points posts"....

Number 1) Learn how to spell properly.

Number 2) Learn which word to use.

Number 3) Below 10 people are active... You might as well just ask the person for their MSN/ICQ/whatever and chat privately.
We've had discussions on this before - pay attention please.
